casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

97-2282. Jewett v. Owners Ins. Co.

Licking App. No. 97CA24. Discretionary appeal allowed and cause held for the decision in 97-402 and 97-551, Ross v. Farmers Ins. Group of Cos., Montgomery App. No. 15865; briefing schedule stayed.

Douglas, Resnick and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent.
